content: a quick and easy cowl using exactly one skein of malabrigo mecha perfect for chilly days one size only **materials** 1 skein of malabrigo mecha *or* minimum of 120m /130y of chunky weight yarn 5 0mm and 6 0 mm 16 circular needles *or* 40 circular for magic loop stitch marker s darning needle note you can adjust the width/length of the cowl but you will need to increase your yarn amount this pattern is designed to use *exactly* one skein
